name: DemandSphere
long_description: DemandSphere enables ecommerce and programmatic SEO teams, both in-house and agency, to drive more traffic from organic search. Our DemandMetrics platform is our core monitoring platform that turns massive amounts of SERP and market data into prioritized insights for growth. Our SERP Intelligence data warehouse accelerates our customer's ability to detect and respond to changes in the search landscape.

name: Positional
all_locations: Charleston, SC, USA; Hoboken, NJ, USA
long_description: Start, grow, and scale your inbound marketing and SEO strategy with a toolset optimized for results — not vanity metrics. Our goal is to connect the workflow from end to end, from keyword research to analytics, and the actions that users take that ultimately drive revenue for a business.
one_liner: A modern platform for content marketing & SEO.

name: Relixir
long_description:
Relixir is the content automation platform for AI search visibility.

For the first time in 20 years, google search has dipped below a 90% market share. This is because people are switching to AI search.

However, old SEO content only works for Google, leaving teams helpless as their customers turn to AI assistants for answers and recommendations that leave them out.

That’s where Relixir comes in to automatically discover, write, and update GEO content that pushes companies to be the answer on ChatGPT, Perplexity, etc.
one_liner: Content Automation for AI Search Visibility
